extendedIngredients.name: whipped topping
extendedIngredients.originalString: Whipped topping and toasted coconut, optional

recipes.title: Poor Man's Pecan Pie

winePairing.pairingText: Pie works really well with Lambrusco Dolce, Late Harvest Riesling, and Vin Santo. These wines are all sweet, which is important since wine should usually be sweeter than the food you're pairing with it. You could try Snake River Late Harvest Riesling. Reviewers quite like it with a 5 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 16 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Snake River Late Harvest Riesling
productMatches.description: Made from the grapes left to hang on the vine in our estate Arena Valley Vineyard, Late Harvest Riesling is our original dessert wine. Our 2011 has a limeade nose with a hint of minerals and a honey finish. Enjoy this wine with fruit based desserts or as a refreshing aperitif.

recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large bowl, combine the first seven ingredients. Pour into pastry shell.                                                                                            Bake at 375째 for 15 minutes; reduce heat to 350째. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cover edges with foil during the last 15 minutes to prevent overbrowning if necessary. Cool on a wire rack. Garnish with whipped topping and toasted coconut if desired.                                        Yield: 8-10 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Poor Man's Pecan Pie in  ReminisceSeptember/October 1997, p49                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (1 piece) equals 339 calories, 12 g fat (6 g saturated fat), 74 mg cholesterol, 173 mg sodium, 57 g carbohydrate, 1 g fiber, 4 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a large bowl, combine the first seven ingredients.
Bake at 375째 for 15 minutes; reduce heat to 350째.
Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cover edges with foil during the last 15 minutes to prevent overbrowning if necessary. Cool on a wire rack.
Garnish with whipped topping and toasted coconut if desired.
